body.p: As I sit here by the open window, this cloudy warm forenoon, I feel that I would just like to write a line (quite purposeless no doubt) sending my love & thanks to you & yours—Do you know this is the anniversary day of my receiving the present through you of the horse & wagon? And much, much good has it done me
—I remain in health much as usual, of late—Shall come over & spend a couple of hours with you soon. Shall send you a postal day before.

postscript.p: Shall get the tinotype of horse & wagon &c. for you, first opportunity—.
